00029 bool collatz_read (std::istream& r, int& i, int& j) {
00030     r >> i;
00031     if (!r)
00032         return false;
00033     r >> j;
00034     assert(i > 0);
00035     assert(j > 0);
00036     return true;}
00037 
00038 // ------------
00039 // collatz_eval
00040 // ------------
00041 
00047 int collatz_eval (int i, int j) {
00048     assert(i > 0);
00049     assert(j > 0);
00050      int begin = -1;
00051      if(i < j){
00052         begin = i;
00053      }
00054      else{
00055         begin = j;
00056      }
00057      assert(begin != -1);
00058 
00059      int range = abs(i - j);
00060      int end = begin + range;
00061 
00062      int v = 0;
00063           for(int k = begin; k <= end; k++){
00064                         int temp = countCycles(k , 1);
00065                         //int temp = countCycles2(k);
00066                         if(v < temp){
00067                                 v = temp;
00068                         }
00069                 }
00070     assert(v > 0);
00071     return v;}
00072 
00073  // ----
00074  // countCycles
00075  // ----
00076 
00083 int countCycles(int n, int counter){
00084                 assert(n > 0);          
00085                 //n is 1
00086                 if(n == 1){
00087                         return counter;
00088                 }
00089                 //n is odd
00090                 else if(n % 2 == 1){
00091                         n = n + (n >> 1) + 1;
00092                         counter += 2;
00093                         return countCycles(n, counter);
00094                         //return countCycles(3*n + 1, ++counter);
00095                 }
00096                 //n is even
00097                 else{
00098                         return countCycles(n/2, ++counter);
00099                 }
00100         }

00114 void collatz_print (std::ostream& w, int i, int j, int v) {
00115     assert(i > 0);
00116     assert(j > 0);
00117     assert(v > 0);
00118     w << i << " " << j << " " << v << std::endl;}
